title.rendered: Container Logging, Continuous Delivery & DevOps: The Future of Kubernetes Integration

content.rendered:
Earlier this week, we hosted a webinar on Container Logging, Continuous Delivery & DevOps: The Future of Kubernetes Integration with special guest Lee Liu from LogDNA. In case you missed it, we’ve recorded it for you to view on demand.

We talked about one of the most effective tools for engineers- logs. We used logs to identify an issue with containers running in Kubernetes and then issued a #GitOps friendly fix to get things running smoothly.

This webinar combines all of the elements of good engineering and DevOps to show a real-world scenario or log, alert, diagnose, fix, deploy

View FULL WEBINAR HERE

 

You can also view the slide deck on Slideshare :

Container Logging, Continuous Delivery & DevOps: The Future of Kubernetes Integration from Codefresh

 

Get started with Codefresh by signing up for an account today!

Have questions? Schedule a 1:1 with us by clicking here

Talk to a LogDNA expert to learn more
